name: Hidden Objects - The Mystery House
description:
Start playing the most exciting hidden object game with the most beautiful theme! Adventure through stunning hidden object levels. Find the objects and items hidden throughout custom designed maps. This is an incredibly relaxing hidden objects game for kids and adults alike!

The objective of hidden objects is to search for objects on the list and find them all to complete a level.

• Gorgeous HD quality artwork.
• High Quality and enjoyable background music.
• Fun gameplay mode.
• Find objects
• Hints to help you when you are desperate.
